message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I'm willing to come down a bit, but not to $9,500. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
